U

UDPPlusReceiver - Class in communication
The UDPPlusReceiver is a protocol based on UDP, but is capable of correcting errors occurred during transmission when decoding a message which was sent over by UDPPlusTransmitter
UDPPlusReceiver(InetAddress, int, FECInterface) - Constructor for class communication.UDPPlusReceiver
Constructs an UDPPlusReceiver instance
UDPPlusTransmitter - Class in communication
The UDPPlusTransmitter is a protocol based on UDP, but is capable of encoding messages using the given FEC algorithms, which when an UDPPlusReceiver receives the message, will decode, and correct any errors occurred during transmission
UDPPlusTransmitter(InetAddress, int, FECInterface) - Constructor for class communication.UDPPlusTransmitter
Constructs an UDPPlusTransmitter instance
UndecodableException - Exception in forwardErrorCorrectionException
This exception is raised when a string whose length is not multiples of 8 is passed to a decode method in ReedSolomonImpl and thus cannot be decoded into decimal integers which should correspond to ASCII codes
UndecodableException(String) - Constructor for exception forwardErrorCorrectionException.UndecodableException
 
UnlocatableErrorException - Exception in forwardErrorCorrectionException
This is the exception raised when a 2-D parity cannot locate the error bit
UnlocatableErrorException(String) - Constructor for exception forwardErrorCorrectionException.UnlocatableErrorException
